hasDitaContent.@value: Minocycline increases the risk of bleeding events when given with acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Minocycline   increases   the risk of bleeding events when given with   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with minocycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Acitretin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   minocycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both minocycline and alcohol (beverage) can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.
